about.name: 'Axel Tarifa'
about.desc: 'Hello! I'm Axel. I'm a 5th year veterinary student by day and an autoditact web developer by night. I enjoy long walks in the forest with my dog, and I am passionate about wildlife and Nature conservation. In the future, I would love to be able to combine my love for conservation and veterinary medicine to my coding skills. Let's get in touch, and discuss your next project!'

portfolio.desc-1: Website designed & developed for a personal trainer, using Reactjs, TailwindCSS and Firebase Hosting
portfolio.desc-2: Case study for a digital media, designed and developped using NextJs, Typescript, TailwindCSS, Sanity Headless CMS for post functionnality and Vercel hosting for Server Side Rendering (SSR)
portfolio.desc-3: Case study for a clinical cases management web application, designed and developped using ReactJs, MaterialUI, Firebase Firestore/ Storage for the backend and Firebase Hosting. Fully functional with possibility to export recorded cases in Pdf format
portfolio.desc-4: Website designed & developed for a crypto community, using Reactjs, ThreeJS for the 'Hero' section, TailwindCSS and Firebase Hosting
